text: hananim-eul gyeongbaehadoe daleungeosgwabiyuhaji malla ttohan bumo-egye hyo dohago chincheoggwa goawa bulssanghan sa lamdeulgwa ius chincheoggwa chincheog-i anin iusgwa jubyeon-ui donglyowa banglangjawa neohuiga soyuhago issneun jongbogdeul-egejaseon-eul bepulla hananim-eun omanha go geomanhan jadeul-eul salanghasiji anh eusinila
